text: CLOSE From family reunions to addictive dramas, here's what's coming to TV this spring. USA TODAY Jason George's character Dr. Ben Warren trades anesthesia for fire hoses in the'Grey's Anatomy'spinoff'Station 19.'( Photo : Mitch Haaseth / ABC ) There's just not enough sizzle to Station 19. ABC's new Grey's Anatomy spinoff ( Thursday, 9 ET / PT, ★½ out of four ), takes a look at a different slice of Grey's Seattle universe, following firefighters as they respond to emergencies — which sometimes take them to Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital that's the setting of the long - running medical drama.
